titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that meals provided at remote fish processing facilities shall be exempt from the limitation on the deduction for meals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt meals provided at fish processing facilities located in Alaska north of 53 degrees north latitude from the limitation on the deduction for meals.
